name: Select Rows
description: Select specific rows in a table component by ID or index. Useful for triggering batch operations, analyzing specific data, or testing selection-based workflows. Publishes selection changes via the context bus for other components to react.

componentId.description: The ID of the table component (e.g., 'query-results', 'users-table'). This is the module ID assigned when the component was rendered.

rowIds.description: Array of row IDs to select. Row IDs are typically from the data's primary key field. Example: ['user-123', 'user-456']

selectAll.description: Select all rows in the table (default: false). When true, ignores rowIds parameter.

clearExisting.description: Clear existing selection before applying new selection (default: true). If false, adds to existing selection.
